title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Culturally Integrated Physics Education for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain Newtonian mechanics concepts (force, motion, energy) through traditional cultural activities.
Learners can enhance analytical skills that consider cultural contexts when applying physical laws to real-life problem-solving.
Learners can scientifically reconstruct prior misconceptions using a conceptual change learning model.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
